A Small Business Owner's Guide to Creating a Website

Apr 19

Welcome to Jekyll!

Posted: April 19, 2014 -
Tag: Hosting

You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo.

LampApps goal is to provide you the resources and tools to create a professional online presence at a low cost. Recommendations of products or services are based on our experience using these products/services or research. LampApps does not provide or support any products or services. However, LampApps may be an affiliate of these companies and may receive compensation if you pay for their products or services. LampApps places quality and value of the services we recommend above any compensation we may receive.
